top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

Woman Down, War In My Mind, the man in black standing at the door, in the darkness of the night .Behind her in the doorway is the  broken mirror with the Woman Down. Broken Heart ,Broken Mind! A gift for Violet O:   https://youtu.be/U3t1BYcsq_k

I have always hated this song...until NOW 🖤! Adding to Playlist immediately. Your voice, your videos, girl what can't you do? Who knew I would find my favorite musicians on YouTube? Can't wait to see what you do next! 🖤
